author: Karolina Modig and Saphora Smith and Willem Marx
title: Sweden's 'free will' coronavirus strategy alarms some scientists
description: In Sweden, it is up to the individual whether to stay home or not during the coronavirus outbreak and the nation's  public restrictions are liberal compared with its European neighbors.
content:
STOCKHOLM As the temperature passed 50 degrees in Stockholm last week, people congregated in parks unable to resist socializing during the first signs of spring in the Swedish capital.
This country of 10 million has bucked the trend in Europe, where many cou… [+5615 chars]
